description:
Chino is just getting out of the military so was looking for ways to make extra money to do some world travel. Apparently his time in the service didn't give him the chance to see too many exotic locations, so he is taking a some time to do some exploring before tackling college.
He seems to be doing some exploring for us here! I did request he grow out his pubes for the Ginger fans, and sure enough he showed up all natural. He is little guy with a big cock nestled into a bed of red pubes.
Chino knows his cock pretty well, and has a natural ability to showcase. He seemed very confident during the photos, so I knew we would be getting a great jerk-off session!
He of course wanted to work with a girl, but after watching his solo (and oral next week) he may be down to do more with a guy!
title: Chino - Solo
